pages.title: Requirements
pages.text: To embed your first gem $(l)you will need$():$(br)$(li)A gem.$(li)An empty armor.$(li)A smithing table.$(li)A $(3)$(l)Sigil of Socketing.$()$(br2)Once you have all that you can start the $(l)smithing process.$()

pages.title: Embed your fist Gem
pages.text: First, use the smithing table to add an $(l)empty socket$() with the $(l)$(3)Sigil of Socketing$().$(br2)Then repeat the same process but with the $(2)$(l)gem$() you would like to embed.
